examples.example: 他在这座城市留下了许多美好的回忆。

translate.english: He left many wonderful memories in this city.

examples.example: 志愿者们的辛勤付出在人们心中留下了深刻的印象。

translate.english: The hard work of the volunteers has left a deep impression in people's hearts.

examples.example: 毕业时我们在校园里留下了充满青春活力的合影。

translate.english: When graduating, we took a group photo full of youthful vitality in the campus.
